name: Solar (Solar Productions)
description:
Welcome to race, space race that will change your mind.

Launch of Sputnik 1 in 1957 has started The Space War between USA and USSR. 

This war cost many lives, but it had a goal. 

A goal that will continue for a very, very long time.

With this game we want to commemorate the memorable landing on the moon of the mission Apollo 11. 

This is 100 percent accurate representation of these events.

Control Space Rockets and land on Moon, Mars, and finally Proxima Centauri B to win and change history. 

Each life matters. 

Make it count !

Game can be played solo, but has been designed for two players. You can control rockets with keyboard and gamepad.

This game has been developed during 2019 Summer #ue4jam by:

Kamil Bonecki

Maciej Drożdż

Mikołaj Wójcik

Enjoy!
